Text: Congratulations to youCongratulations on your promotion to CEO at Enron While working hard for your money over here at Questia I was pleasantly surprised at the news Take care and it was a pleasure chatting with you ps hope you found some new wave shoes that you like Best Regards Scott Shields Director Business Development Questia Media Inc direct fax REGISTER FOR A FREE TRIAL Last day to register January Service available January trialstudyindexhtml FORWARD TO A FRIEND
